original_text: But Uriah slept at the door of the king's house with all the servants of his lord, and did not go down to his house.
korean_text: 그러나 우리아는 집으로 내려가지 아니하고 왕궁 문에서 그의 주의 모든 부하들과 더불어 잔지라

sentences.original_text: But Uriah slept at the door of the king's house
with all the servants of his lord
and did not go down to his house.
